summary: Italian Gothic horror that tells the tale of a man who stops at a remote castle hoping to get medical help for an injured woman, only to find the inhabitants mirror the darker sides of the woman and himself.
cast: Rita Calderoni|Stelio Candelli|James Harris|Renato Lupi|Iolanda Mascitti|Luigi Antonio Guerra|Barbara Lay|Augusto Boscardini|Alfredo Pasti|Gota Gobert
title: Nuda per Satana
